body: This is a ram suspended from chains or ropes within a gallery. A gallery ram does not require a charge action for full momentum. In addition, adding tethers to the back end of the ram allows four additional crew members to assist in using the ram.
name: Gallery Ram
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Siege Engines/Siege Weapon Descriptions/Close Assault Siege Engines/Rams/Gallery Ram
